member.summary: The end of the file has been reached successfully.

member.summary: Reader is at a property.

member.summary: Reader is in an array.

member.summary: The Close method has been called.

member.summary: Reader has just read a value.

member.summary: Reader is at the start of a constructor.

member.summary: Reader in a constructor.

member.summary: An error occurred that prevents the read operation from continuing.

member.name: F:Newtonsoft.Json.JsonReader.State.Finished
member.summary: The end of the file has been reached successfully.
